WHYME.DESCRIPTION: Why are you passionate about programming? You can mention some key qualities such as analytical thinking, creativity, perseverance, and team spirit. A solution-oriented mindset is always an advantage.

MYSKILLS.INFOTEXT: I am motivated to continuously expand my skills and implement innovative solutions. I keep myself up to date with new technologies and current trends.

Tab1.CONTENT1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks via drag & drop, assign users and categories.
Tab1.CONTENT2: My code is divided into clearly structured modules (UI, services, Firebase integration) to ensure reusability. Files, variables and classes are named consistently and descriptively. Documentation is done directly in the code using JS Doc comments for better understanding. Code quality is ensured through Prettier and version control via Git.
Tab1.CONTENT3: Our team consisted of 4 people. My task in this project was to create the task components. The technologies used were, of course, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and reading and saving data via Firebase was the main implementation. It was a very good team and we worked together smoothly.

Tab1.CONTENT2: My code is divided into clear modules (HTML, CSS, Canvas rendering, JS logic) for better maintainability. Files, variables, functions and classes are named consistently and descriptively. Important functions are documented with JSDoc. Complex logic gets short comments. Git is used for version control and clean commit structure.
Tab1.CONTENT3: I really enjoyed working on this project because I was able to deepen my knowledge in HTML, CSS, Canvas, and JavaScript. Working with the Canvas API for drawings, animations, and interactive elements was particularly interesting.

Tab1.CONTENT1: Using JavaScript, I fetched data from a Pokémon API and processed it as JSON. The results were then displayed dynamically in the browser.
Tab1.CONTENT2: First, I created the HTML structure and styled the layout with CSS. Then, I implemented the logic using JavaScript and built the functions in a modular way. Finally, I integrated fetching and processing of data from web APIs to display dynamic content.
Tab1.CONTENT3: I really enjoyed working on this project because I was able to deepen my knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fetching and processing data from web APIs was particularly interesting.

TEAMPLAYER.HEADLINE2: Here’s what my colleagues say about me

PLAYER.DESCRIPTION: "Christian was a great help in the team. He is very supportive, always patient, and absolutely reliable. His structured way of working often helped us move forward. Simply someone who makes collaboration pleasant and productive."

"Christian has proven to be an extremely competent and committed team member. He thinks independently, brings in his own ideas, and works very reliably. His clear and open communication was particularly valuable, making our collaboration effective and enjoyable. He actively participated in group discussions and contributed to a great team atmosphere with his friendly and humorous personality."

"I had the pleasure of working with Christian on a web development project. He impressed with his technical knowledge, clear structure, and solution-oriented mindset. His communication skills and team spirit made the project efficient and successful. Highly recommended!"

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact Me
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to contact me if you have a job offer or an opportunity where I can contribute my expertise as a master electrician and programmer. I am particularly interested in roles in IoT, embedded systems, smart home technologies, and modern web development (Angular, SCSS, Firebase).
CONTACT.PRIVACYPOLICY_NOTICE: I have read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as described.
